entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-03
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • iOS: Button not resizing on text Change #25074
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Documented VisualStateManager Button/Entry examples throws an exception #25069
  • Tab bar handler issue Android #25064
  • Why is button event click not working inside AbsoluteLayout for Window #25063
  • DeploymentManagerCS is back - app can't start #25062

Closed

  • [net9.0] Shift platforms specific code from HybridWebView to the handler using Command Mappers #24269
    9.0-rc2
  • OrientationStateTrigger does not work if in the setters of the state TargetName is used #22001
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • Exception "this element is not in a namescope" when using Setter with TargetName for VisualState = Normal #16208
    Backlog
  • Tab bar showing at the top instead of bottom in ios 18 #25065
  • Narrator is not announcing the status message as result found when results are found and visible status message when result is not fond for search recipe edit filed : A11y_.NET Core_RecipesAppMyRecipesNew_Search box_screen reader #22845
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • When keyboard focus is on "Korean egg roll" recipe of my recipe list and press ENETR/SPACE key recipe is not opening: A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes_My Recipes_Keyboard #22823
    .NET 9.0 GA
  • [META] Xcode 16.0 Support for .NET 8/9 and MAUI #24819
  • In MacCatalyst App Email.Default.IsComposeSupported always returns false in macOS!!! #24991
  • High crash rate: 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Platform.Compatibility.ShellPageRendererTracker+TitleViewContainer' does not have a constructor that takes one NativeHandle argument. #24938
  • Frame + Shadow ignores TapGestureRecognizer #22518
    Backlog
  • .NET 8 MAUI Android - Storage.Preferences returns default value when executed whilst the application isn't open/running #23837
  • Shadow Offset Style breaks Android in Release mode #24601
  • Invalidate() does not invoke Draw() #24035
  • MAUI template missing in visual studio 2022 17.12 #24888
  • Role-based authorization not working correctly when using Blazor WebView in MAUI App #24874

PullRequests

Created

  • [tests] CV 2 devicetests #25078
  • WIP: HybridWebView: Invoke .NET methods from JavaScript #25077
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [net9.0] Fix CV2 handler and tests #25076
  • [release/8.0.1xx-sr9] [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #25075
    .NET 8 SR9.2
  • [blazorwebview] align `SupportedOSPlatform` attribute with templates #25073
    area-blazor
  • Fix [Android] Image AspectFill is not honored #25072
    community ✨
  • Fix Switch view has inconsistent colors when "off" #25068
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨
  • [android] Fallback to default icons in SearchHandler #25067
    community ✨
  • [Winodws] Fixed TextCell Command executes only once #25066
    community ✨

Merged

  • [net9] Try fix running UITests on iOS18 #25070
  • [X] allow namescope resolution before parenting #22854
    area-xaml
  • Match Catalyst Template to iOS for Shell Flyout Items #25056
  • Adding tests (disabled) from Control Gallery to Appium #25024
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-testing, testing-legacy-ui-tests
  • (Re)enable Mail API for Mac Catalyst #24998
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-essentials

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • [Android] Custom back button image color #24993
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, area-controls-titlebar
  • Re-enable tests #24912
  • [iOS] Improve background layer frame mapping performance #24848
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [net9.0] Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25055
  • Fix for Windows SearchBar MaxLength > 0 not working properly. #24919
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Move to rtm #25017
  • Fix DatePicker slow first render (#24929) #24948
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨
  • [UITest] Remove the bottom section of iOS UITest #24586
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing
  • Fixed NavigationPage TitleBar visibility issue when set to the parent page #25000
    community ✨
  • Fix TabBar visibility when navigating back from a non-tabbed page to a tabbed page #25004
    community ✨
  • [Android] Tabs briefly display wrong background color when navigating between flyout items #24965
    community ✨
  • Fix Text entry border disappear when changing to/from dark mode in Android #24433
    community ✨, area-controls-entry
  • [Android] Fix Flickering issue when calling Navigation.PopAsync #24887
    community ✨
  • NullReferenceException throws on Windows when setting Cookies on .NET MAUI WebView #24846
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR1
  • [Windows] - Picker on windows shows "Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Picker" if ItemsSource has an empty string #24276
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Apply Shell.TitleColor to toolbar items #24985
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-toolbar
  • Fix iOS picker placeholder text overrided (#15139) #15198
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • [iOS] Fix Editor control does not scroll properly on iOS when enclosed in a Border control. #24683
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-editor
  • Fix deprecated API usage for embedded fonts on iOS/Catalyst 18.0+ #25025
  • Fixed Shell Tab is still visible after set Tab.IsVisible to false #24999
    community ✨
  • CollectionView Header/Footer/EmptyView issues when adding/removing items. #24830
    community ✨
  • [Android] Fix app crash caused by dynamic template switching in ListView #24808
    community ✨
  • Fixed Microsoft.Maui.Controls 8.0.90 (Latest stable) Ruins Entry Controls #25006
    community ✨
  • Fix for unable to select a tab after backing out of a page and returning. #25011
    community ✨
  • [Windows] Bump `Microsoft.Web.WebView2` from `1.0.2592.51` to `1.0.2739.15` #24329
    area-infrastructure, community ✨
  • Picker in ListView works on Windows but not on Android #24403
    community ✨, area-controls-picker
